mapper.insert:
insert into mall.base_customer_info(type, phone, real_name, addr_province, addr_city, addr_district, addr_detailed, remark, email, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag, version) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.realName}, #{entity.addrProvince}, #{entity.addrCity}, #{entity.addrDistrict}, #{entity.addrDetailed}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.version})

insert into mall.base_customer_info(type, phone, real_name, addr_province, addr_city, addr_district, addr_detailed, remark, email, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag, version) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.realName}, #{entity.addrProvince}, #{entity.addrCity}, #{entity.addrDistrict}, #{entity.addrDetailed}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.version})
on duplicate key update type = values(type) , phone = values(phone) , real_name = values(real_name) , addr_province = values(addr_province) , addr_city = values(addr_city) , addr_district = values(addr_district) , addr_detailed = values(addr_detailed) , remark = values(remark) , email = values(email) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , create_by = values(create_by) , update_by = values(update_by) , del_flag = values(del_flag) , version = values(version)
